item.title: [COLOR=orange][B][I] DISCOVERY [/I][/B][/COLOR][COLOR=lime](WebTV)[/COLOR]

regex.name: select_Url
regex.expres: $pyFunction: '$doregex[get_sxstream]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Safari/537.36' if not '$doregex[get_sxstream]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Safari/537.36'=='' else '$doregex[get_sxstream1]|User-Agent=iPhone'

item.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64; rv:50.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/50.0

item.title: [COLOR=orange][B][I] HISTORIA [/I][/B][/COLOR][COLOR=lime](WebTV)[/COLOR]
item.link: rtmp://$doregex[get-ip]/stream playpath=historiab?id=21918$doregex[pk] conn=S:OK swfUrl=http://www.liveflashplayer.net/resources/scripts/fplayer.swf pageUrl=http://www.liveflashplayer.net/ live=true timeout=10

item.title: [COLOR=orange][B][I] NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC [/I][/B][/COLOR][COLOR=lime](WebTV)[/COLOR]
item.link: rtmp://$doregex[get-ip]/live playpath=natgeoax?id=84757&pk=$doregex[get-pk] swfVfy=1 timeout=10 conn=S:OK live=1 swfUrl=http://www.embeducaster.com/static/scripts/fplayer.swf flashver=WIN\2019,0,0,226 pageUrl=http://www.embeducaster.com/embedplayer/natgeoax/1/650/500
item.name: get-ip
get-pk
